statements: SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_date FROM subscribers WHERE package_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE package_id = 2 ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND package_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscription_date FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC, subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_name LIKE 'J%' OR subscriber_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY subscriber_name, subscriber_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name FROM subscriber_data WHERE service_offering = 'Internet';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_history WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT subscriber_name, service_offering FROM subscriber_data WHERE virtualized_network = 'VPN' ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE subscriber_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT subscriber_name, service_offering FROM subscriber_data WHERE virtualized_network = 'Data Center';
SELECT DISTINCT subscriber_id, subscriber_name FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_history WHERE DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) > 30;
SELECT subscriber_name, service_offering, start_date FROM subscriber_data JOIN subscription_history ON subscriber_data.subscriber_id = subscription_history.subscriber_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_type FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_cost < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_cost > 50.00;
SELECT subscriber_name, service_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscribers s JOIN subscriptions sub ON s.subscriber_id = sub.subscriber_id JOIN services ser ON sub.service_id = ser.service_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers FROM subscribers;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_type FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_category, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_category = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01' AND subscription_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT environment_name, environment_type FROM network_environment ORDER BY environment_name;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC, subscription_start_date ASC;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_type FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_type = 'premium' OR subscription_type = 'gold';
SELECT s.service_name, s.service_description, s.service_cost, su.subscription_date FROM services s JOIN subscriptions su ON s.service_id = su.service_id;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscription_date FROM subscribers s JOIN subscriptions su ON s.subscriber_id = su.subscriber_id WHERE s.subscription_type = 'standard';
SELECT * FROM network_environment WHERE environment_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT plan_name, data_limit, price FROM service_plans WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT subscriber_id, device_type, operating_system FROM subscriber_devices ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM network_services WHERE service_type = 'Internet';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscribers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT s.first_name, ss.start_date FROM subscribers s JOIN service_subscriptions ss ON s.subscriber_id = ss.subscriber_id;
SELECT sp.plan_name, sp.data_limit, sp.price FROM service_plans sp WHERE sp.price > 50;
SELECT sd.device_type, ns.service_name FROM subscriber_devices sd JOIN network_services ns ON sd.device_id = ns.service_id;
